DOC.brief_summary: This study observational study evaluate clinical outcome mucosal spar proton beam therapy ( PBT ) resection favorable risk oropharyngeal cancer patient . Subjects screen outpatient clinic visit appointment interested qualified subject consent offer participation study . Once consent obtain baseline adverse event Quality Life ( QOL ) data collect subject undergo adjuvant PBT follow-up 3 month , 12 month , 24 month . No study-specific visit evaluation require . Patients evaluate accord physician 's standard practice discretion . Patient data drawn patient ' medical record report mean web-based electronic data collection ( EDC ) system . Patients consider `` study '' 24 month observation occur , withdrawal consent , lose follow-up , study closure .
